WorkItem.Description:
Need to support the common aggregates and built-in functions. I'm having trouble imagining how to do this such that making use of these can be done in a concise way.
 
adapter.Max("max param") ?
 
or
 
enum Aggregates { Max, Min, Count, ... }
adapter.Aggregate(Aggregates.Max, "max param")
 
and via extension method
 
Aggregates.Max(adapter (optional), "max param")
Aggregates.Max("max param")

Comments.Message:
enum Aggregates { Max, Min, Count, ... }
adapter.Aggregate(Aggregates.Max, "max param")
